alert.note: Alert for Catawba; Gaston; Lincoln (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Catawba, eastern Lincoln and northeastern Gaston Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Huntersville, or near Denver, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lincolnton, Gastonia, Dallas, Stanley, Lowell, Ranlo, Westport, High Shoals, Boger City and Iron Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
